name: DREAM JOB (JMS777, Harvey_W, RoboPenguin)
description:
Work hard enough, and you might just attain that DREAM JOB.

But constant yelling from your boss at every mistake will drive you deeper and deeper into a daydream about confronting him…

Made for LD48, with the theme “Deeper and Deeper”.

Hope you enjoy!

Jeremy, Rob and Harvey  

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to move
  • E to interact
  • ESC to pause

CREDITS:

  • Programming – Jeremy and Harvey
  • Visuals - Rob

EXTRA RESOURCES USED:

  • Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/hey-happy-cheerful
  • Everything else was made by us within the jam time limit
